items.title: Holy vs. Unholy Pride

blocks.title: The Ultimate Message
blocks.intro: This discourse delivers one of the most liberating teachings in Chassidus:

items.content: Our connection to Hashem isn't dependent on our spiritual state. Whether we're on fire with inspiration or frozen in darkness, the essential bond exists unchanged in the core of our being.
How do we access it? Through simple, honest crying out: "Hashem, I need You. Help me." That's it. No sophisticated meditation required. Just faith that He hears you and only He can help.
Every sincere prayer is Esther falling before the King. Even the deepest concealment can become "×–×”"â€”tangible and realâ€”until all hiddenness becomes light with the revelation of Moshiach.
